meanings.definition: A group of conspirators or accomplices.
meanings.sent1: The covines gathered in the shadows to plan their next move.
meanings.sent2: The covines worked together to carry out the heist.
meanings.sent3: The covines whispered in hushed tones, plotting their scheme.
meanings.sent4: Their covines were like a silent army, ready to strike at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The image of the covines meeting in secrecy was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: Secret or illicit cooperation or partnership.
meanings.sent1: The covines shared a knowing glance, their secret partnership unspoken.
meanings.sent2: Their covines allowed them to operate under the radar.
meanings.sent3: The covines' hidden alliance was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Their covines intertwined like a tangled web of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The covines' clandestine dealings were finally exposed to the light.
